resources.string: Sorry! Login unsuccessful. Please try again later.
You have been logged out. Please log in again to continue.
Enter registered email or 10-digit mobile number.
Please enter a valid email or phone number.
Oops! Looks like some thing messed with the backend! Be right back.
Please enter a password before proceeding.
Oops! Looks like you haven\'t registered with us yet! Kindly register to continue or login with fb or google.
Password must have at least 6 characters.
Password and confirm password do not match.
Please agree to our terms and conditions before proceeding forward
Name can contain only alphabets and spaces.
This email id is already registered with us.Use Forgot password option to access your profile.
This mobile number is already registered with us.Use Forgot password option to access your profile.
You are now registered at Waochers! Happy Discounting :)
You have exceeded maximum number of tries. Please try again after sometime.
Password reset successful! Login to continue.
Password Reset failed. Please try again later.
